title.en: Jimi de Nekura na Watashi desu ga, Naze ka Ikemen-gaka kara Koibito Yaku wo Tanomarete Konwaku shiteimasu

altTitles.ja: 地味で根暗な私ですが、なぜかイケメン画家から恋人役を頼まれて困惑しています

altTitles.ja-ro: Jimi de Nekura na Watashi desu ga, Naze ka Ikemen-gaka kara Koibito Yaku wo Tanomarete Konwaku shiteimasu

description.en:
Chloe, the daughter of parents' art supply shop "The Bird's Nest," is a simple girl who is not very good at getting involved with people. This is because she was teased as a child as a "crow living in the Bird's Nest" because of her habitually black hair.
One day, while she was working at the store due to her parents' long absence, a handsome man came into the store. He was Sigurth, the artist who illustrated Chloe's favorite adventure novels.
Apparently, he was commissioned to illustrate a romance novel, which led to his inability to paint anymore. He came to the store relying on the special "Bird's Nest" paints. But his parents were away and there were no paints to give him...
At that moment, Sigurth thought that the reason he could not paint a picture of love was his lack of experience in love...so he asks Chloe to fall in love with him...!
A pure and sweet love story between a "simple, gloomy, art supply shop girl" and a "handsome painter who is a beginner in love"!
